DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this ex-vivo study is to evaluate the insertion procedure for the ProstaPlant implant in human prostates and the support that it supplies to the prostate.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the ProstaPlant Prostate Stent Insertion in Ex Vivo Human Prostate
DOC.criteria: Males, 18 years old and up, Suffer from BPH, Candidate for radical prostatectomies According to the physician's decision
